localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Teamflow is a virtual office for your team to hang out. Bring back the camaraderie of being in the office, the energy of working in the same room, the spontaneity of hallway conversations. ⠀ The joy of feeling like a team again.
blogPost.body: Teamflow is a virtual office for your team to hang out. Bring back the camaraderie of being in the office, the energy of working in the same room, the spontaneity of hallway conversations. ⠀ The joy of feeling like a team again.
blogPost.title: Teamflow - Feel like a team again with your own virtual office
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Teamflow是一个虚拟的办公室，让你的团队在这里闲逛。让您重拾在办公室的情谊，重拾在同一房间工作的活力，重拾在走廊上交谈的自发性。⠀ 再次感受到团队的快乐。
localize.tagline: 拥有自己的虚拟办公室，重新感受团队的力量。

localize.description: Teamflow是一個虛擬的辦公室，讓你的團隊在這裏閒逛。讓您重拾在辦公室的情誼，重拾在同一房間工作的活力，重拾在走廊上交談的自發性。⠀ 再次感受到團隊的快樂。
localize.tagline: 擁有自己的虛擬辦公室，重新感受團隊的力量。

previous.excerpt: Unai is both a VR headset and a virtual world designed specifically for it. The hardware and software are being built together to make spending time with people in VR feel the same as in real life.
previous.title: Unai - A VR headset & world designed for real social interactions

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR头显，也是一个专门为它设计的虚拟世界。软硬件共同打造，让在VR中与人相处的感觉和现实生活中一样。
localize.tagline: 一款专为真实社交互动而设计的VR头显与世界。

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR頭顯，也是一個專門爲它設計的虛擬世界。軟硬件共同打造，讓在VR中與人相處的感覺和現實生活中一樣。
localize.tagline: 一款專爲真實社交互動而設計的VR頭顯與世界。

next.excerpt: Sertifier is an all-in-one education data collection tool that makes smart certificates and open badges 🚀 easy to issue 😇 enjoyable to earn and 🔍 simple to analyze!
next.title: Sertifier - Best way to send education certificates

localize.description: Sertifier是一个集所有功能于一身的教育数据收集工具，它可以让智能证书和开放式徽章🚀轻松发行😇愉快地获得和🔍简单地分析!
localize.tagline: 寄送学历证书的最佳方式

localize.description: Sertifier是一個集所有功能於一身的教育數據收集工具，它可以讓智能證書和開放式徽章🚀輕鬆發行😇愉快地獲得和🔍簡單地分析!
localize.tagline: 寄送學歷證書的最佳方式
